newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Bovespa sees 312.09 mln real capital inflow in Nov.
newsitem.headline: Bovespa sees 312.09 mln real capital inflow in Nov.

text.p: The Sao Paulo Stock Exchange (Bovespa) said it registered foreign capital inflows of 312.093 million reais in November.
Foreign buys amounted to 2.921 billion reais, against foreign sales of 2.609 billion reais.
In October, Bovespa saw capital inflows of 315.342 million reais.
So far this year, foreign capital inflows have totalled 2.658 billion reais, the bourse added.
